Html:
I Develope a XBAP Partial trust that use datagrid. This DataGrid has a TemplateColumn that use AutoComplateBox as Editing Element.

When Click on One of that Column's cell throw the exception

Systm.Security.SecurityException: That assembly does not allow partially trusted callers.

any idea? tanx

I don't think that the WPF Toolkit is safe to use in partial trust.  I had a less explicit error from the charting components (http://wpf.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=210081) that occurs because of running in partial trust. 

It would be nice if someone from the project would comment on their support / non support of patial trust.
